snippet: To the Editor:   Bret Schundler (Op-Ed, Oct. 28) ignores the open invitation to large-scale fraud that the school voucher system represents. More than anything else, this galvanized opposition to the voucher proposition that failed on the Californ...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Bret Schundler (Op-Ed, Oct. 28) ignores the open invitation to large-scale fraud that the school voucher system represents. More than anything else, this galvanized opposition to the voucher proposition that failed on the California ballot.

headline.main: School Voucher Plans Don't Improve Education; Invitation to Fraud
